title: 20% Off on All Flights
description: Enjoy a 20% discount on any flight booking.
conditions: Applicable on flights above $200. Maximum discount $50.

title: Upgrade to Business Class for Free
description: Book an economy class ticket and get a free upgrade to business class.
conditions: Only for international flights. Subject to availability.

title: 50% Off on Seat Upgrades
description: Upgrade your seat to premium economy at half the price.
conditions: Available on domestic flights only. Limited seats available.

title: Fly Anywhere for $100
conditions: Valid on flights under 4 hours. Taxes not included.

title: 15% Off on Round Trips
description: Save 15% when you book a round trip.

title: Kids Fly Free
description: Book an adult ticket and get a free ticket for a child.
conditions: Valid for children under 12. One child per adult.

title: 30% Off for Frequent Flyers
description: Frequent flyers get 30% off their next booking.

title: Companion Flies for Half Price
description: Bring a companion along for half the price of their ticket.
conditions: Companion must travel on the same flight. Maximum one companion per booking.

title: Exclusive $150 to Europe
description: Fly to select European cities for just $150.
conditions: Valid on economy class only. Taxes included.
